channel.title: Johannes Taelman
channel.description: Does anybody know if Johannes Taeman is ok?

item.title: Johannes Taelman
item.dc:creator: @jaffasplaffa Mr. Grimm
item.description:
@jaffasplaffa wrote:

I think he is probably fine.

He works at a university, so probably pretty busy with his everyday life and work.

I agree, though, he should be more active on this forum, since it's his product, his forum, etc.

If there is anything you are looking for answers for, you can ask and the community is usually pretty helpful

But yeah, if it's regarding Axoloti development, only Johannes knows, I guess......

Read full topic

item.title: Johannes Taelman
item.dc:creator: @mrtata
item.description:
@mrtata wrote:

Hi,
Last time we heard some news about Johannes and the axoloti project was in may on this topic:

Reflections on the Axoloti and Akso boards and Bela

I skyped with Johannes last week. He is definitely alive and kicking! He told me the main problem now for the production of Axoloti Core boards is the availability of the processor. I don't know how much I can disclose here now (we didn't discuss this...) but I think I can say I've seen two different prototypes with an M7 processor on board! So I'm pretty sure this is not the end of Axoloti. It's just a very difficult project for one man to manage everything. This together with the past and â€¦

Read full topic
